dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: 낮말은 새가 듣고 밤말은 쥐가 듣는다이/가 뭐예요?
dialogue.romanization: natmaleun saega deutgo bammaleun jwiga deutneundai/ga mwoyeyo?
dialogue.translation: What is "낮말은 새가 듣고 밤말은 쥐가 듣는다"?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: 낮말은 새가 듣고 밤말은 쥐가 듣는다은/는 walls have ears(이)에요.
dialogue.romanization: natmaleun saega deutgo bammaleun jwiga deutneundaeun/neun walls have ears(i)eyo.
dialogue.translation: "낮말은 새가 듣고 밤말은 쥐가 듣는다" means "walls have ears".
